name: Goalgetter
description:
In the first-person football career simulator, you can make your dream of becoming a top striker in one of the major European leagues come true.



You are a young, talented striker. Now, you have the opportunity to play professional football. Secure your spot through intense training or try to win the favor of fans and the coach in other ways. Give interviews, participate in TV shows, and read about your last game in the newspaper. Find the right agent to optimize your career.

But your personal life matters too. Do you want to get married, have children, and become a homeowner, or do you prefer a sports car? Will you risk it all at the casino, or slowly save your salary? Invest in stocks from various sectors and monitor their performance, or do you want to put your money into more speculative ventures? The decisions are yours alone to make. Sign endorsement deals and boost your popularity on social media through appropriate actions. Move to other teams and employ your personal fitness or mental coach.

Be careful not to fall in with the wrong crowd or get too distracted from football.

Win the favor of the national coach and participate in World and European Championships. Play with your favorite club in national and international cup and league matches. The game covers all major competitions.

In the game, do you want to dive, play for the team, or focus more on your personal success? Passing or shooting, time-wasting or counterattacking, playing on the offside line or provoking the opponent – it's all in your hands!

In addition to your career, with Goalgetter, you can also replay historic World Cup tournaments. Play as a striker in the 2022 World Cup, or do you want to experience the Miracle of Bern in 1954? It's up to you.


Extensive Content

  • Simulate your player's entire career, from their first professional contract at the age of 17 to retirement.
  • Replay historic World Cup tournaments.
  • Take control of any national team in the world.
  • Includes all major leagues and cup competitions such as the World Cup, European Championship, Club World Cup, Nations League, Champions League, Europa League, Conference League, Cup, League Cup, Super Cup, and more.
  • Play with up to 4 players on one PC or through Steam Remote Play.
  • You have full control over the game world. Customize players, leagues, countries, referees, and teams to your liking.
  • Share your self-created editor and community content with other players through the Steam Workshop.

Impressive Presentation

  • Beautiful 3D graphics in corresponding locations such as the stadium, locker room, office, casino, living room, etc.
  • Former Goalgetter Ailton explains the intricacies of the professional football business to you in over 40 minutes of videos in the "Ask Ailton" feature.
  • Detailed statistics.
  • Engage in intense conversations with teammates, your girlfriend, agent, coach, etc. in 3D.
  • Experience action-packed gameplay from a first-person perspective.
  • Numerous realistic and occasionally humorous events add variety to the gameplay.

Infinite Possibilities

  • Make the right decisions and apply the appropriate shooting techniques in live matches.
  • Live-game options cover all aspects of modern football.
  • Improve your 15 skills through training. Do you want to follow the coach's instructions or set your own priorities?
  • Work on your 6 character traits, as this is the only way to exclusively benefit from the positive effects of the character trait.
  • Choose 2 special abilities at the beginning of the game and acquire up to 11 more, such as Header Beast, Battle Pig, Monster Shot.
  • Request favors from your teammates or help them secure their place in the team.
  • Give interviews in newspapers and on television.
  • Host fan parties and gatherings for your teammates.
  • Enhance your popularity with teammates, fans, coaches, national coaches, the press, and others through various conversations and actions.
  • Receive video tips from striker legend Ailton and thus improve your skills.
  • Become a team council member and team captain, leading the national team as captain onto the field.
  • Do you want to negotiate contracts yourself or hire an agent?
  • Employ private fitness trainers, physiotherapists, or mental coaches.
  • Enjoy your personal life, take vacations, host parties, start a family, and make friends, but be mindful not to jeopardize your fitness.
  • Keep your girlfriend happy, negotiate sponsorship deals, and donate money to charitable causes.
  • Become a social media star and increase your follower count with relevant posts.
  • Purchase cars, houses, and other luxury items.
  • Establish your own company and invest your football-related income in it.
  • Visit the casino and play roulette or try your luck on a slot machine.
  • Pay attention to your health to avoid long-term injuries and consider appropriate insurance.
  • Invest in stocks and monitor their performance, or would you prefer to allocate your funds differently?
